findings.description: CORS misconfiguration allowing arbitrary origins with credentials enabled on a WordPress API endpoint can allow malicious sites to read sensitive page data on behalf of authenticated users.
findings.exploitation_steps: Create malicious webpage that makes XMLHttpRequest to https://www.plex.tv/wp-json/wp/v2/pages/20856 with credentials. If user is logged into Plex, the request will succeed and return page data that can be exfiltrated to attacker's server.
